docs.text: Home  Welcome to TurboWarp Thingys :D (Its in WIP)
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Welcome to TurboWarp Thingys :D (Its in WIP)
docs.title: Home

docs.text: How to communicate with the server  So when you connect the server will send 2 messages { "type":"id", "id":"afe4e809-dbaa-4beb-a850-d87fd59ec1e4" } The type field is always there and explain what the server is sending This message is the server sending you your id Then the other message will be { "type":"server_data", "data":{ "address":"wss://place.natounet21.dev", "version":"0.1.7.1", "features":[ "text", "username", "timestamp", "chatarray" ] } } This message is the server sending you what it can do for now this not useful but when the server will be open source it will be useful to know what the server are you communicating with can do. Authentification  After you will need to respond there two messages you can use : The first is to authenticate with ScratchAuth { "type":"auth" } When sending this the server will send back { "type":"authing", "url":"https://..." } After you can use the Network extension of TurboWarp to open a new tab with this url sent in the JSON. After displaying and that the user connect with the popup it should close automatically but something it might not. After you are authed :D But before let me explain the other message The other message is : { "type":"set_user", "name":"Uhmmm" } The name field is the username you want then you are also Authed NOTE : This cracked authentification if you use it your username will look like [✖] name but if you were Authing with ScratchAuth it would look like : [✔] name Rooms  After authing or before you need to set your room before sending anything this what to send { "type":"set_room", "room":"genral" } Communication  YAY you are now authed time to chat! First to chat you will need to send this : { "type":"chat", "message":"Message" } Replace message by your message after everyone will recieve: { "type":"chatted", "message":"Message", "username":"[✔] name", "id":"afe4e809-dbaa-4beb-a850-d87fd59ec1e4" } Join and leaves  This experimental and can bug a lot but this how when someone join you will recieve : { "type":"join", "name":"[✔] name" } and for disconnect : { "type":"disconnected", "name":"[✔] name" }
docs.title: How to communicate with the server

docs.text: So when you connect the server will send 2 messages { "type":"id", "id":"afe4e809-dbaa-4beb-a850-d87fd59ec1e4" } The type field is always there and explain what the server is sending This message is the server sending you your id Then the other message will be { "type":"server_data", "data":{ "address":"wss://place.natounet21.dev", "version":"0.1.7.1", "features":[ "text", "username", "timestamp", "chatarray" ] } } This message is the server sending you what it can do for now this not useful but when the server will be open source it will be useful to know what the server are you communicating with can do.

docs.text: After you will need to respond there two messages you can use : The first is to authenticate with ScratchAuth { "type":"auth" } When sending this the server will send back { "type":"authing", "url":"https://..." } After you can use the Network extension of TurboWarp to open a new tab with this url sent in the JSON. After displaying and that the user connect with the popup it should close automatically but something it might not. After you are authed :D But before let me explain the other message The other message is : { "type":"set_user", "name":"Uhmmm" } The name field is the username you want then you are also Authed NOTE : This cracked authentification if you use it your username will look like [✖] name but if you were Authing with ScratchAuth it would look like : [✔] name

docs.text: After authing or before you need to set your room before sending anything this what to send { "type":"set_room", "room":"genral" }

docs.text: YAY you are now authed time to chat! First to chat you will need to send this : { "type":"chat", "message":"Message" } Replace message by your message after everyone will recieve: { "type":"chatted", "message":"Message", "username":"[✔] name", "id":"afe4e809-dbaa-4beb-a850-d87fd59ec1e4" }
